payload.content: Arrived from the south road; cold wind, warm welcome at the tavern.
Sketched verses about a watchful guard and a market's murmur.
Heard rumors of a petty thief with muddy boots.
Played a lively reel at the tavern; innkeep promised stew.
Saw Rurik haggle; he looked troubled about supplies.
Practiced lute tremolos; tripped on the bridge section again.
Sang a ballad in the square, passersby smiled.
Asked a merchant about night sounds; a latch rattling near the east gate.
Noted scuffed footprints under a market stall.
Sang a ballad in the square, passersby smiled.
Practiced lute chords, still rusty on the bridge.

goals.short_term: Finish a song that weaves local rumors (gate latch, muddy boots)
Perform at market to gather tips and gossip

goals.medium_term: Broker introductions between townsfolk to spark stories

goals.long_term: Compose an epic about small heroes keeping the peace

goals.social: Support Halvar and Rurik with morale and news; earn meals by song
